Good Comments: I give them a big thumps up for completing this series. Well done.
More accurate than Rumbel. I compared half an episode line for line. It's easier to read than Rumbel and SFW, the fond is just fine. Also karaoke with even japanese lettering.

They go through a huge effort to make sure the subs are as accurate as possible; they're easy to read, stylized nicely during the OP, and they even provide clear notes (which is especially helpful for this series).
The subs themselves are alright, but I really hate how they did the OP/ED. Hugeass, unfitting fonts and unnecessary special effects.
Only group that ever bothered to continue this series.
They put a lot of work into their releases.  The fonts are good, it's styled good, and there's good notes.
Thanks for subbing the anime no one wants to sub :)
Bad Comments: they're the one who continue this. good flow of dialogue
The only sub group who really gives a damn about this series
Spelling mistakes, and not accurate enough sometimes. Also, the font sucks.
if they have ddl's i'll aways go with them becausei h8 torrents.... i will leech those mother fuckers!!!!
great subs, historical details aplenty, and ongoing progress whereas other groups have stopped.
Misleading translations, uses a lot of unnecessary words in a confusing way, giant font that they try to cram into one scene, too many words on screen at once, and generally sounds very bad
